EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize Agile Testing - April 16 - EMEA.Email - Miss You - EMEA
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our webinar, Optimize Agile Testing with Tricentis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Optimize Agile Testing with Tricentis
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
We’re sorry we missed you at our webinar, “Optimize Agile Testing with Tricentis.” We enjoyed talking about test automation for agile projects, risk reduction, and the Tricentis approach to agile testing. Lively questions and dialogue from our audience only improved the experience.
Want to see what you missed? Check out a recording of this and other webinars at www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>. Best Wishes,
The Tricentis Team
Michael Niessl Sales Support at Tricentis
Joshua Davis Tricentis Marketing
